snippet: Liberals have never been fans of John Roberts; then-Sen. Barack Obama voted against his confirmation to the Supreme Court. But at last Thursday night's Congressional baseball game, Democrats taunted Republicans with chants of "Justice Roberts."
abstract: Liberals have never been fans of John Roberts; then-Sen. Barack Obama voted against his confirmation to the Supreme Court. But at last Thursday night's Congressional baseball game, Democrats taunted Republicans with chants of "Justice Roberts."

headline.main: Washington Flip Flops on Justice Roberts
